email.title: LEAF STOPPER CONFIRMATION
email.description: Thank you for your Leaf Stopper enquiry. If you do not receive a call from an installer in 72 hrs pls call or email us 1300 334 333 - office@leafstopper.com.au

sms.title: LEAF STOPPER CONFIRMATION
sms.description: Thank you for your Leaf Stopper enquiry. If you do not receive a call from an installer in 72 hrs pls call or email us 1300 334 333 - office@leafstopper.com.au

email.title: NEW LEAF STOPPER LEAD - ACCEPT or DECLINE
email.message:
Hi [org_name]

We have received a new Leaf Stopper enquiry at [suburb_name]. Please ACCEPT or DECLINE this lead.

If we don’t receive a reply from you within [aod-pending], the lead will lapse and it will be reassigned.

If you accept, your investment if the lead is WON will be $0.00.

Click the button below to ACCEPT or DECLINE this lead.

Suburb: [suburb_name]
Postcode: [postcode]
State: [state]

email.title: YOUR LEAD PROGRESS UPDATE HAS BEEN RECEIVED
email.message:
Hi [org_name],

Your PROGRESS response has been received. Please update the lead status within [inprogress-awaiting-response] to advise if this lead has been WON (installed) or LOST. You can extend the time if needed by updating the lead status.

Update the status of this lead using the button below or by signing into your account at www.traleado.com/login
